Title: Tale of Tails
Description:
The newborn lynx have wandered off again!

Those rascally cats are always up to mischief, darting off without a care. With Peevish missing and only Vesper and I to hold this position, your assistance would be a boon!

I reckon those pesky felines are somewhere nearby. See if you can bring them back.

I would use a light and search the cave, the spider-infested area to the south, and the coast to the north.
ObjectivesText: Locate Beans, Beef, Thunder, and Cap'n Elaena. Then return them to Attica Whiskervale.
